alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Lyon; Pershing; Washoe (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 05 at 4:00PM PDT until June 05 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... Washoe County in western Nevada... Southwestern Pershing County in west central Nevada... North central Lyon County in west central Nevada... * Until 500 PM PDT. * At 357 PM PDT, a dust wall was stretching from south of Lovelock to Fallon moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. I-80 from Lovelock to Fernley. US-95 from Trinity Junction to Fallon. ALT-US-50 from east of Hazen to Fernley. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Fernley, Hazen, Trinity Junction, Fallon Municipal Airport, Desert Peak, Junction I 80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Fernley - Tiger Field Airport, Lovelock Derby Field Airport, Toulon Peak, Fernley Sink Near I-80, Battleground Point and Wadsworth. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... DUST STORMS ARE DEADLY. Less than 1/4 mile visibility. If caught in dust, pull off the road and turn off all lights. Delay travel if at all possible.
